attributes.action: Get the Prime Minister to debate Nigel Farage on the EU membership, live on TV
attributes.background: A petition to push for a live, televised debate on the UK's EU membership between David Cameron and Nigel Farage. This is to achieve transparency from the Prime Minister in terms of validity of his pro-EU claims.

rejection.details: We cannot accept your petition as it is the responsibility of the broadcasters, not the UK Government or Parliament, to decide what programmes to show on television. It would also be for Mr Farage to decide if he wanted to take part.
